title: Pope apologizes for 'deplorable evil' of Indigenous abuse in Canadian Catholic residential schools
content:
1. Pope apologizes for 'deplorable evil' of Indigenous abuse in Canadian Catholic residential schools  CNN
  2. Pope apologizes for 'catastrophic' school policy in Canada  The Associated Press - en Español
  3. The Pope went to Canada to apologize. For some indigenous school survivors, he triggered more pain  CNN
  4. Anguished Cree anthem caps emotional Pope apology in Canada  Reuters Canada
  5. Pope apologizes for abuses of Indigenous children at Canada schools as part of ‘penitential pilgrimage’  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
